sentences.english: Mark, what are you going to do with the lottery money?
sentences.vietnamese: Mark, bạn sẽ làm gì với số tiền xổ số?

sentences.english: I'm going to plan an amazing family vacation.
sentences.vietnamese: Tôi sẽ lên kế hoạch cho một kỳ nghỉ gia đình tuyệt vời.

sentences.english: I want to take my wife and kids to an exotic place.
sentences.vietnamese: Tôi muốn đưa vợ con tôi đến một nơi kỳ lạ.

sentences.english: It's going to be a surprise.
sentences.vietnamese: Nó sẽ là một bất ngờ.

sentences.english: Are you going to buy a new car?
sentences.vietnamese: Bạn định mua một chiếc ô tô mới phải không?

sentences.english: Not now, because our family car is very new
sentences.vietnamese: Không phải bây giờ, vì xe của gia đình chúng tôi còn rất mới

sentences.english: But I'm going to buy a really nice bike for my son
sentences.vietnamese: Nhưng tôi sẽ mua một chiếc xe đạp thật đẹp cho con trai tôi
Anh ấy thích đi xe đạp

sentences.english: Are you going to buy a new bike for your daughter, too?
sentences.vietnamese: Bạn cũng định mua một chiếc xe đạp mới cho con gái mình phải không?
Không, cô ấy không thích xe đạp.

sentences.english: I'm going to buy new furniture for her room
sentences.vietnamese: Tôi sẽ mua đồ nội thất mới cho phòng của cô ấy.
Cô ấy sẽ thích điều đó.

audio.answer: Mark, what are you going to do with the lottery money?
audio.otherAnswer: Mark, what are you going to do with the lottery money?

audio.answer: I'm going to plan an amazing family vacation.
audio.otherAnswer: I am going to plan an amazing family vacation.

audio.answer: I want to take my wife and kids to an exotic place.
audio.otherAnswer: I wanna take my wife and kids to an exotic place.

audio.answer: It's going to be a surprise
audio.otherAnswer: It is going to be a surprise

audio.answer: Are you going to buy a new car?
audio.otherAnswer: Are you going to buy a new car?

audio.answer: Not now, because our family car is very new
audio.otherAnswer: Not now, because our family car is very new

audio.answer: but I'm going to buy a really nice bike for my son
audio.otherAnswer: but I am going to buy a really nice bike for my son

audio.answer: Are you going to buy a new bike for your daughter, too?
audio.otherAnswer: Are you going to buy a new bike for your daughter, too?
No, she does not like bikes.

audio.answer: I'm going to buy new furniture for her room. She'll love that.
audio.otherAnswer: I am going to buy new furniture for her room. She'll love that.
